title: New Product Launch
message: We are excited to announce the launch of our latest product line! Check it out now.

title: Company Meeting
message: We will be holding our quarterly company meeting next week. Don't forget to attend!

title: Upcoming Holiday Closure
message: Please be advised that our offices will be closed on May 1st for the Labor Day holiday.

title: Reminder: Performance Reviews
message: Don't forget to complete your self-evaluation and schedule a meeting with your manager for your performance review.

message: We are currently looking for talented individuals to join our team. Check out our website for the latest job postings.

message: Don't forget to enroll in or make changes to your benefits for the upcoming year. The deadline is approaching soon!
